oneOf.description: ISO datetime as string, for example 1970-01-01T01:23:45.832330

beforePost.description: Only fetches posts up to and not including this post id.

afterPost.description: Only fetches posts after and not including this post id.

afterTime.description: Only fetches post after before given timepoint.

beforeTime.description: Only fetches post created before given timepoint.

redownload.description: If true, WILL redownload and overwrite messages already stored by previous runs. On false (default), this behavior is minimized on best effort basis.

downloadFromOldest.description: Selects download direction, going from oldest to newest by default.

maximumPostCount.description: There cannot be more than this amount of posts in the storage. Good as sanity check on large channels for bulk download. Unlimited if -1 or default.

sessionPostLimit.description: Download only up to given number of posts in one session. Unlimited if -1 or default.

download.description: Whether to download file attachments or not. Defaults to false.

maxSize.description: Download only files that are up to and including given size in bytes.

allowedMimeTypes.description: Download only files of specified mime types. No limit if ommited.

download.description: Whether to download used custom emojis or not (default).

metadata.description: Whether to store metadata structures for stored emoji (default) or not. If not, custom emojis are retained only in text form.

download.description: Whether to download user icons (avatars) or not (default).

connection.description: Contains all needed to set up a connection with the server.

hostname.description: Mattermost server url used as prefix to api calls.

downloadTeams.description: Should download team-based channels? (Ones explicitly specified in `teams` are treated separately)

items.description: Team scraping info. May also specify subset of data to be scraped

downloadPublicChannels.description: Should download public channels (yes by default)? Ones explicitly specified in `publicChannels` are treated separately.

publicChannels.description: Public (open) channels to save (all if ommited).

downloadPrivateChannels.description: Should download private channels (yes by default)? Ones explicitly specified in `privateChannels` are treated separately.

downloadUserChannels.description: Should download direct user to user channels (yes by default)? Ones explicitly specified in `users` are treated separately.

users.description: List of users we want to save private conversations with.

downloadGroupChannels.description: Should download group channels (yes by default)? Ones explicitly specified in `users` are treated separately.

groups.description: List of groups we want to save conversations with.

items.description: Group channel selector. Specify by id or list of users.

group.description: Identification of a group channel. Either channel id or list of users.

downloadEmojis.description: Whether to download all custom emojis available, regardless of origin. To download only emojis used in posts being downloaded, use per-channel option.

loopDelay.description: Delay between bulk requests in ms.

standalonePosts.description: Whether posts contain redundant information that makes them readable without looking up ids.

humanFriendlyPosts.description: Drops unnecessary ids from posts (replacing userIds with userNames).

verbose.description: Shows extra information, useful for debugging.

showProgress.description: True if smart interactive download progress be reported along the way (deduced by stdout type by default).
